statements: SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'Sony';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, calibration_record FROM equipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%microscope%';
SELECT manufacturer, maintenance_log FROM equipment ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, calibration_record FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.' ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_log FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC, equipment_id ASC;
SELECT manufacturer, calibration_record FROM equipment WHERE manufacturer IS NOT NULL AND calibration_record LIKE '%calibrated%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_equipment FROM equipment;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, calibration_date FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, calibration_date FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Electrical';
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, calibration_date, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE calibration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Computer' AND calibration_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, calibration_date FROM equipment WHERE calibration_date IS NULL;

SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_description FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_log ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_log.equipment_id WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT id, name, manufacturer FROM equipment;
SELECT model, purchase_date FROM equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, calibration_date, calibration_value FROM calibration_records WHERE calibration_value > 1000 ORDER BY calibration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT name, manufacturer, model FROM equipment WHERE manufacturer='CompanyA';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT equipment.name, calibration_records.calibration_value FROM equipment JOIN calibration_records ON equipment.id = calibration_records.equipment_id;
SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer FROM equipment ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM equipment ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, calibration_result FROM equipment INNER JOIN calibration_records ON equipment.equipment_id = calibration_records.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM equipment WHERE purchase_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT equipment.equipment_id, equipment.equipment_name, maintenance_logs.maintenance_desc FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_logs ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_logs.equipment_id;
SELECT users.username, calibration_records.calibration_date FROM users JOIN calibration_records ON users.user_id = calibration_records.equipment_id;

SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS maintenance_count FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_logs ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_logs.equipment_id GROUP BY equipment_name, manufacturer;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT name, type FROM equipment WHERE type = 'Calibration';
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, technician FROM maintenance_log ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM calibration_records WHERE result = 'Pass' AND calibration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, city FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment ORDER BY name DESC, id ASC;
SELECT name, type FROM equipment WHERE type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_log WHERE technician = 'John Doe' AND details LIKE '%inspection%';
SELECT equipment.name, calibration_records.result FROM equipment JOIN calibration_records ON equipment.id = calibration_records.equipment_id WHERE calibration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT locations.location_name, technicians.name, technicians.specialization FROM locations LEFT JOIN technicians ON locations.location_id = technicians.tech_id;
